Static_Discharge.help: Discharges a cone of Static Electricity that deals damage and drains Endurance from all affected foes in the area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Shocking_Bolt.help: Holds a distant foe by shocking him with electricity. The seized target is left writhing in agony and is unable to defend himself. Shocking Bolt also drains some Endurance from the target over time. A portion of drained Endurance may be returned to you. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Shocking_Bolt.targetHelp: You are being held and are on fire.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You recover some of the Endurance you drained.

Charged_Armor.help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. You must be level 41 and have Static Discharge or Shocking Bolt before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast
Charged_Armor.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Surge_of_Power.help: When you activate this power, you transform your body into living Electricity and become extremely resistant to all damage but Psionics. However, expending all this energy will leave you exhausted, and drained of all endurance. You must be level 41 and have Static Discharge or Shocking Bolt before selecting this power. Recharge: Very Long

messages.victimHit: Your {PowerName} power has left you exhausted.

EM_Pulse.help: You can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy. This EMP will drain the endurance and HP regeneration of all affected targets and leave them incapacitated and Disoriented for a while. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of endurance and leaves you unable to recover endurance for a while. You must be level 44 and have two other Electrical Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Very Long
EM_Pulse.shortHelp: PBAoE, Foe Disorient, -END, -Regen, Special vs. Robots; Self -Recovery
EM_Pulse.targetHelp: You are Disoriented by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.
